AbstractClient - Class in Clinic.Client.Connection
The AbstractClient contains all the methods necessary to set up the client side of a client-server architecture.
AbstractClient(String, int) - Constructor for class Clinic.Client.Connection.AbstractClient
Constructs the client.
AbstractConnectionFactory - Class in Clinic.Server.Connection
The AbstractConnectionFactory is an abstract class that must be subclassed when one want to use a subclass of ConnectionToClient class.
AbstractConnectionFactory() - Constructor for class Clinic.Server.Connection.AbstractConnectionFactory
 
AbstractServer - Class in Clinic.Server.Connection
The AbstractServer class maintains a thread that waits for connection attempts from clients.
AbstractServer(int) - Constructor for class Clinic.Server.Connection.AbstractServer
Constructs a new server.
AdaptableClient - Class in Clinic.Client.Connection
The AdaptableClient is a class that extends the AbstractClient in place of the ObservableClient .
AdaptableClient(String, int, ObservableClient) - Constructor for class Clinic.Client.Connection.AdaptableClient
Constructs the client adapter.
AdaptableServer - Class in Clinic.Server.Connection
The AdaptableServer is an adapter class that extends the AbstractServer class in place of the AbstractObservableServer .
AdaptableServer(int, ObservableServer) - Constructor for class Clinic.Server.Connection.AdaptableServer
Constructs the server adapter.
addAppointment(Appointment) - Method in class Clinic.Core.Schedule
